Sentencas: Manganate cathodes have good stability, but their performance at intermediate temperatures is not satisfactory, restricting the application for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H-SOFCs).
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A new composition, Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-delta (PLASM), is proposed to solve this problem.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: First-principles calculations indicate PLASM should have better performance than the classical Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) cathode by favoring the formation of oxygen vacancies and proton defects.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimental studies indicate that the PLASM material can be successfully synthesized and show good chemical stability.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The H-SOFC using the single-phase PLASM cathode shows improved performance than that using the traditional LSM cathode, demonstrating the prediction from the theoretical calculations.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Further optimizing the cell structure, an encouraging performance of 1266 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C is obtained, which is larger than many other manganates cathode-based H-SOFCs.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance is even comparable to many high-performing cathodes for H-SOFCs, indicating PLASM is an efficient cathode material for H-SOFCs.
Titulo: A new Pr0.25Nd0.25Sr0.5MnO3-δ cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells
